use.flag: Enable lazy locking (only lock when multi-threaded)

pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This ebuild fork adds patches necessary to make jemalloc it work with openusd package and changes necessary to avoid merge conflicts with the jemalloc package.
It was decided to keep this one with -mtls-dialect=gnu2 separate from the original to avoid possible complications or avoid introducing new bugs systemwide.
